cqs: How many relations are described between c1 and c2 that dp1 dt1?
How many relations are available between c1 and c2 that dp1 dt1?
How many things could c1 do with c2 that dp1 dt1?
How many things can c1 do with c2 that dp1 dt1?
How many relations are there between c1 and c2 that dp1 dt1?
How many things may c1 do with c2 that dp1 dt1?
How many relations are proposed between c1 and c2 that dp1 dt1?
How many relations exist between c1 and c2 that dp1 dt1?
query: SELECT (COUNT(?x) AS ?cnt) WHERE { <c1> rdfs:subClassOf [ rdf:type owl:Restriction ; owl:onProperty ?x ; owl:someValuesFrom [ owl:intersectionOf ( <c2> [ rdf:type owl:Restriction ; owl:onProperty <dp1> ; owl:hasValue <dt1> ] ) ] ] . }
